content:
Check:
  any:
    - name: RFSTDTC
      operator: invalid_date
    - name: RFENDTC
      operator: invalid_date
    - name: BRTHDTC
      operator: invalid_date
    - name: --STDTC
      operator: invalid_date
    - name: --ENDTC
      operator: invalid_date
    - name: --DTC
      operator: invalid_date
    - name: --RFTDTC
      operator: invalid_date

Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.67
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Values of variables RFSTDTC,  RFENDTC, BRTHDTC, --STDTC, --ENDTC, --DTC,
  --RFTDTC must be correct ISO-8601 dates / datetimes
Outcome:
  Message: Variable value is not in correct ISO 8601 date or datetime format
  # Output Variables:
  #  - --DY
  #  - --STDY
  #  - --ENDY
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '67'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The SENDIG requires dates and times of day to be stored
                  according to the international standard ISO 8601 (http://www.iso.org).
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: '4.4'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Values of variables RFSTDTC,  RFENDTC, BRTHDTC, --STDTC, --ENDTC, --DTC, --RFTDTC must be correct ISO-8601 dates / datetimes

Outcome.Message: Variable value is not in correct ISO 8601 date or datetime format

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The SENDIG requires dates and times of day to be stored according to the international standard ISO 8601 (http://www.iso.org).
